clause: What Information We Collect and Receive How We Use Your Information and Our Legal Basis How We Share Your Information How We Transfer Your Information How We Protect Your Information How Long We Store Your Information Your Rights & Choices Your Responsibilities Privacy Policy Changes Additional Disclosures for United States Residents Our Relationship With You Contact Us At Etsy, we care deeply about privacy.

clause: We strive to be transparent about what information we collect, and how we use, share and retain it.
label: none

clause: This Privacy Policy explains our privacy practices for Etsy.com (which we’ll refer to as the "Site"), Etsy’s mobile applications, including the Etsy App and the Etsy Seller App (together, the "Apps"), Etsy Payments, Pattern by Etsy, Etsy’s public Application Programming Interface (the “API”), and other services provided by the Etsy companies (the "Services") set out at Section 11 (which we’ll refer to as "Etsy," or as "we," "us," and "our").
label: none

clause: We’ll use the term “Services” to refer collectively to the Site, the Apps, Etsy Payments, Pattern by Etsy, and the API.
label: none

clause: This policy applies to our registered buyers (“Buyers”) and sellers (“Sellers”) (together, our “Members”), those who purchase items on Etsy without an account (“Guests”) and anyone else who visits our Sites or uses our Services (together with our Members and Guests, “you” and “your”).
label: none

clause: This Privacy Policy, as well as our Cookies & Similar Technologies Policy and Cookies & Similar Technologies Disclosures apply to all of your interactions with our Sites and our Services, including our Cookies & Similar Technologies Policy and Cookies & Similar Technologies Disclosures.
label: tracking

clause: If you are not a registered Member or a Guest, please see our Non-Member Privacy Policy for further information about how we may collect and use your information, available here.
label: none

clause: This policy does not apply to the practices of Etsy Sellers.
label: none

clause: It also does not apply to any third parties that you may choose to share information with when you use the Services.
label: data_sharing

clause: Please note that the collection and use of your information by these third parties is subject to their own privacy policies and terms.
label: none

clause: You should understand the privacy and security practices of any third party before you share information with them.
label: data_sharing

clause: It is important for you to understand how we use your information.
label: none

clause: You should read this policy in full, but some key points to help you navigate the policy are: Etsy’s mission is to Keep Commerce Human.
label: none

clause: We are the marketplace for unique items from real people.
label: none

clause: We stay true to this by connecting buyers with items made, designed, handpicked, or sourced by creative sellers around the world.
label: none

clause: By accepting our Terms of Use and this Privacy Policy, or by using any of our Services, you confirm that you have read and understand, and in countries outside the United Kingdom (“UK”) or European Economic Area (“EEA”) agree to this policy.
label: none

clause: We collect and use your information to provide and improve our Services, to protect the security and integrity of our Services and to comply with our legal obligations.
label: none

clause: To learn more about the information we collect and how we use it, see Section 1 and Section 2 below.
label: none

clause: We share your information with other Etsy group companies, trusted partners and service providers to provide our Services, for security purposes, to understand how you use and interact with our Services and to meet our legal obligations.
label: none

clause: You have certain rights over our use of your data, including the right to object to certain types of processing that we carry out.
label: none

clause: Depending on your location, different Etsy entities may provide different parts of the Services to you.
label: none

clause: For more information on your relevant service provider(s) and data controller(s), along with details of how to contact them, see Section 12.
label: none

clause: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, or wish to exercise your rights, see Section 12 for further information about how to contact us.
label: none

clause: You can learn more about Etsy’s policies by visiting our House Rules and Help Center.
label: none

clause: What Information We Collect and Receive In the course of providing our Services, we collect and receive information that directly or indirectly relates to you in different ways and from different sources, which we have set out below.
label: none

clause: The capitalized terms in this Section 1 are definitions that we use throughout this Policy, so please refer back to this table as necessary.
label: none

clause: How We Use Your Information and Our Legal Basis When you access or use the Services or interact with our Sites and/or Apps, we collect, use, share, and otherwise process your information for the purposes described in this policy.
label: none

clause: To the extent required by applicable law, we rely on a number of legal bases to use your information in these ways.
label: none

clause: If you reside outside the European Economic Area (“EEA”), Switzerland or the United Kingdom (“UK”) (together referred to as the “European Region”), the legal bases on which we rely may differ from those listed below.
label: none

clause: How We Share Your Information We share your data with third parties where necessary to provide the Services, comply with our legal obligations, or for purposes set out in this Privacy Policy, including: Publicly Displayed Information: By using the Services, certain information about you will be publicly displayed on the Site and Apps, such as Buyer Public Profile Information and Seller Public Profile Information (as defined in Section 2).
label: data_sharing

clause: Buyers and Sellers can choose to make certain information and activities private through their account or Public Profile settings.
label: none

clause: We will also display other information connected with your use of the Services, including the date you joined, information relating to items you review (including the content of the reviews), photos or videos of items you purchased, your Favorites and Collections, followers, those you follow, comments you post in our community spaces, and information you decide to share via social networks.
label: none

clause: Your reviews of shops or items you’ve purchased may also be shared on other platforms and indexed by search engines, including Google.
label: none

clause: For certain Sellers, some additional information may be publicly displayed.
label: none

clause: For example, your business name, shop location, or business registration number associated with your account (which you may modify and update in your account settings) may be publicly displayed.
label: none

clause: Etsy Group Companies: We may share some of the information that we collect, such as Buyer Account Information, Seller Account Information, Seller Verification Information, Service Usage Information, Device and Browser Information, and Cookie Information, with our corporate affiliates, which include Etsy, Inc., Etsy Ireland UC, Etsy Payments Ireland Limited, Etsy Gifting LLC, Etsy UK, Ltd., other Etsy entities, and Etsy-owned affiliates (including Depop Ltd.
label: none

clause: ), that help us conduct business around the world (together, the “Etsy Group Companies”).
label: none

clause: The information shared among the Etsy Group Companies may be used for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy and generally to operate our business, including for ID verification purposes, transaction monitoring, fraud prevention, payment processing, marketing, the issuing of, and use of, gift cards as a payment method, legal and regulatory compliance, customer support, business development, user account administration, and IT, technical, and engineering support.
label: none

clause: Sellers: We may share aggregated information about your use of the Services to Sellers, for example, if you are a frequent purchaser or a new Buyer, so they can provide you with better service and so we can improve our Site and Apps.
label: none

clause: To improve the shopping experience, we may collect and display certain Seller information, including when and how they interact and use the Services, in order to, for example, display when Sellers were last active, or to show average Seller response times.
label: none

clause: Linked Third-Party Websites or Services: Some Members may choose to connect to Etsy or register an Etsy account using an external third-party application, such as Facebook or Google.
label: data_sharing

clause: Connecting your Etsy account to third-party applications or services is optional.
label: data_sharing

clause: If you choose to connect your account to a third-party application, the providers of those services or products may receive information about you that Etsy, you, or others share with them.
label: data_sharing

clause: You can choose to link your payment processing or bank account to facilitate paying for purchases (or to receive payment and disbursements, in the case of Sellers in select markets) through a third-party service available through the Site or Etsy App.
label: data_sharing

clause: When you register with these third-party partners, we will tell you what information is collected and what information the third party will share with Etsy.
label: data_sharing

clause: Please be aware that when you use third-party sites or services, their own terms and privacy policies will govern your use of those sites or services in addition to our own terms and privacy policy.
label: data_sharing

clause: Business Partners: Etsy works closely with a number of business partners, such as our delivery and payment partners, that assist us with providing the Services in accordance with our Terms of Use.
label: none

clause: When one of these companies assists us in facilitating your transaction, we or they may need to share information related to the transaction in order to complete your order, monitor activity on the Sites and Apps, such as transaction activity, or to resolve post purchase support or transaction related issues, such as refunds or disputes.
label: data_sharing

clause: Etsy also partners with other businesses to make Sellers’ products available off Etsy.
label: none

clause: Etsy and our partners will tell you how we and they collect, use, and share your information.
label: none

clause: Etsy also offers services or products from affiliated businesses, such as services that assist our Sellers with accounting or other small business management services.
label: none

clause: These affiliated businesses may sell items or services to you through the Services or offer promotions (including email promotions).
label: none

clause: In each case, these partners will process your information in accordance with their own privacy policies.
label: none

clause: We encourage you to read the privacy policies and ask questions of third parties before you disclose your information to them.
label: none

clause: Professional Advisors, Industry Partners, Authorities, Regulators, and other Entities: We share your information described in Section 2 with our advisors, consultants, regulators and tax authorities, law enforcement, government agencies, civil litigants, industry partners (for example, trade groups), and other entities as reasonably necessary to: comply with applicable law or regulations, court orders, subpoenas, legal process, or government requests; detect, investigate, prevent, or address actual or suspected fraud, violations of Etsy’s Terms of Use, and other illegal activity or security and technical issues; and/or protect the rights, property and safety of our Members, Etsy and the Etsy Group Companies, or others, including to prevent death or imminent bodily harm.
label: none

clause: Advertising and Marketing Services: Etsy works with third-party advertising and marketing partners for interest-based advertising purposes as described here.
label: data_sharing

clause: Business Reorganization: In some cases, Etsy may choose to reorganize its business.
label: none

clause: In these types of transactions (such as a sale, merger, liquidation, receivership, or transfer of all or substantially all of Etsy’s assets), Member information is typically one of the business assets that is transferred.
label: none

clause: If Etsy intends to transfer information about you, Etsy will notify you by email or by putting a notice on the Site and the Apps.
label: none

clause: Community Services: We engage third parties to assist in providing Community Services, which includes the Etsy Forums and Teams, and need to share certain information about you for these purposes.
label: none

clause: This may include, for example, Buyer Public Profile Information and Seller Public Profile Information, the date that you registered on Etsy, as well as your language and regional settings on the Site.
label: none

clause: For more information, see our Community Policy.
label: none

clause: Service Providers: Etsy also engages third-party companies and individuals (such as research companies, analytics services, and security providers) to help us operate, provide, and advertise the Services.
label: data_sharing

clause: These third parties have limited access to your information, may use your information only to perform these tasks on our behalf, and are prohibited from disclosing or using your information for other purposes.
label: none

clause: In addition, Etsy also engages third-party service providers who facilitate the sharing of data between similar companies (e.g., retail companies) for purposes such as fraud prevention and security.
label: data_sharing

clause: The types of third-party service providers that we work with include: 4.
label: data_sharing

clause: How We Transfer Your Information Etsy operates a global e-commerce platform.
label: none

clause: By using the Services, you acknowledge that Etsy will use your information in the United States, Ireland, and any other country where the Etsy Group Companies operate.
label: none

clause: Please be aware that the privacy laws and standards in certain countries, including the rights of authorities to access your information, may differ from those that apply in the country in which you reside.
label: none

clause: To the extent that Etsy is deemed to transfer information outside of the EEA, we rely separately, alternatively, and independently on the following legal bases to transfer your information: Adequacy Decisions Where available, we rely on decisions of the European Commission, known as “adequacy decisions,” recognizing that certain countries offer a level of protection of data that is essentially equivalent to the EEA.
label: none

clause: A list of adequacy decisions is available here via the European Commission website.
label: none

clause: Standard Contractual Clauses Otherwise, we also rely on the European Commission’s Standard Contractual Clauses for the international and onward transfer of your data outside of the EEA to third countries, including, for example, to the United States and India.
label: none

clause: This includes transfers from Etsy Ireland UC to Etsy, Inc.
label: none

clause: and other Etsy Group Companies in addition to our service providers.
label: none

clause: You can request a copy of our Standard Contractual Clauses by emailing dpo@etsy.com.
label: none

clause: Necessary for the Performance of the Contract Between Etsy and Its Users You can choose whether or not to use the Etsy Services.
label: none

clause: As we operate in countries worldwide and use technical infrastructure in the US to deliver the Services to you, in accordance with the contract between us (including our Terms of Use), we transfer your information to the US and to other jurisdictions as necessary to provide the Services.
label: none

clause: Simply put, we can’t provide you with the Services and perform our contract with you without moving your information outside of your home country, including the UK or EEA.
label: none

clause: How We Protect Your Information The security of your information is important to us.
label: none

clause: We protect your information through technical and administrative measures designed to mitigate the risk of unlawful or unauthorized access, destruction, loss, alteration, disclosure, or use of your data.
label: none

clause: To protect your account, we encourage you to choose your password carefully and enable two factor authentication (2FA) for signing in.
label: none

clause: You can learn more about enhancing your account security in your account settings.
label: none

clause: We use Google reCAPTCHA Enterprise and Mastercard’s Ekata (Mastercard’s identity verification product) in connection with our Services to help prevent spam, fraud, and abuse.
label: none

clause: reCAPTCHA Enterprise collects hardware and software information, such as device and application data, and sends it to Google for purposes of providing, maintaining, and improving reCAPTCHA Enterprise and for general security purposes.
label: none

clause: Your use of reCAPTCHA Enterprise is subject to Google’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.
label: none

clause: Mastercard’s use of your information to provide us fraud prevention solutions is subject to the Ekata Privacy Policy.
label: none

clause: How Long We Store Your Information Etsy will retain your information only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Policy, for as long as your account is active, or as needed to comply with our legal obligations, internal policies, or under applicable law.
label: none

clause: We decide how long we need information on a case-by-case basis and depending on the retention laws applicable.
label: none

clause: The following factors typically affect the retention period.
label: none

clause: Necessity to provide our Services We keep your information as long as necessary to provide the Services to you.
label: none

clause: This includes things like maintaining and improving the performance of our Sites and Apps, keeping our Services secure, and maintaining appropriate business and financial records.
label: none

clause: Most of our retention periods are determined on the basis of this general rule.
label: none

clause: Consent-based processing of data If we process your data on the basis of consent (including consent to the extended storage), we store the data for as long as necessary to process it according to your consent or until you withdraw your consent.
label: none

clause: Statutory, contractual, or other similar obligations Etsy will retain and use your information to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, for example, if we are required to retain your information to comply with applicable tax/revenue laws, Know Your Customer (“KYC”), and similar obligations.
label: none

clause: Here's what we consider when deciding how long to keep your information: 7.
label: none

clause: Your Rights and Choices Certain privacy laws around the world, including the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), provide users with rights and choices related to their information.
label: none

clause: Consistent with those laws, Etsy gives you the choice of accessing, editing, or removing certain information, as well as choices about how we contact you.
label: none

clause: In addition, subject to applicable law, you may have certain rights with respect to your information, such as the following: Right to Access: You can access certain information associated with your account by visiting your account privacy settings.
label: none

clause: You can request a copy of your information in an easily accessible format, as well as an explanation of how that information is used.
label: none

clause: See thisHelp Center article for more information.
label: none

clause: Right to Portability: You have the right to receive certain of your information which you provided in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format and to transmit such information to another controller.
label: none

clause: Right to Correction: You have the right to request that we rectify any inaccurate information about you.
label: none

clause: You can correct and change certain information through your account settings.
label: none

clause: Right to Restrict Processing: In certain cases, you may also have the right to restrict or limit the ways in which we use your information.
label: none

clause: Right to Deletion: In certain circumstances, you have the right to request the deletion of your information, except information we are required to retain by law, regulation, or to protect the safety, security, rights, and integrity of Etsy.
label: none

clause: Please note that closing your account may not free up your email address, username, or shop name (if any) for reuse on a new account.
label: none

clause: See this Help Center article for more information.
label: none

clause: Right to Object: If we process your information based on our legitimate interests as explained above, or in the public interest, you can object to this processing in certain circumstances.
label: none

clause: In such cases, we will stop processing your information unless we have compelling legitimate grounds to continue processing or where it is needed for legal reasons.
label: none

clause: Right to Withdraw Consent: Where we rely on consent, you can choose to withdraw your consent to our processing of your information using, for example, an email unsubscribe link or your account privacy preferences.
label: none

clause: If you have consented to share your precise device location details with us, you can revoke that consent through the settings on your mobile device.
label: none

clause: This is without prejudice to your general right to permanently close your account and delete your information.
label: none

clause: Please be aware that withdrawing consent will not affect the lawfulness of processing that happened before you withdraw your consent.
label: none

clause: Automated Decision-Making: You have the right not to be subject to a decision when it is based solely on automated processing (i.e.
label: ai_decisions

clause: an operation that is performed without any human intervention), if it produces a legal effect or significantly impacts you, except under certain conditions, for example, where the decision is necessary for our contractual relationship with you, you have provided your consent, or when Etsy is authorized under relevant law to conduct such processing.
label: none

clause: You have the right to request additional safeguards in these circumstances, such as the right to obtain a human review of the decision.
label: none

clause: Right to File a Complaint: If you are a resident in the EEA, Switzerland or the UK, you have the right to lodge a complaint about our data protection practices with the supervisory authority of your country or state.
label: none

clause: In the UK, the relevant data protection authority is the Information Commissioner's Office, Wycliffe House, Water Lane, Wilmslow, Cheshire, SK9 5AF, +44 (0303) 123 1113, casework@ico.org.uk.
label: none

clause: In Ireland, the relevant data protection authority is the Data Protection Commission, 21 Fitzwilliam Square South, Dublin 2, D02 RD28, +353 017650100 / + 353 1800437737, email: info@dataprotection.ie or by using this Please see the United States Regional Privacy Policy for information about your privacy rights under certain US state laws.
label: none

clause: How to Exercise Your Rights and Choices.
label: none

clause: If you would like to manage, change, limit, correct, or delete your information, you can do so via your Etsy account settings or profile.
label: none

clause: Alternatively, you can exercise any of the rights above, subject to applicable law, through the contact options set out in Section 11.
label: none

clause: Once you contact us to exercise any of your rights, we will confirm receipt of your request.
label: none

clause: Limiting use of, or deleting, your information may impact features and services that rely on that information.
label: none

clause: We may send you marketing communications via email, text messages (SMS), mobile push notifications, and other digital or social media tools, with your consent where required.
label: none

clause: You can opt out of receiving marketing text messages by texting STOP.
label: none

clause: For marketing emails, you can opt out by using unsubscribe links or visiting your account settings.
label: none

clause: Even if you opt out of marketing messages, you may still receive service-related communications from us.
label: none

clause: Certain communications from Etsy are service-related or legally required and you will continue to receive them even if you opt-out.
label: none

clause: Your Responsibilities If you are a Seller on our Services or if you use Etsy’s API, you may receive certain information and will have legal obligations with respect to certain information.
label: none

clause: Your privacy responsibilities are laid out in the Etsy Seller Policy and the Etsy API Terms of Use.
label: none

clause: Privacy Policy Changes We may amend or update this policy from time to time.
label: none

clause: If we believe that the changes are material, we’ll let you know by posting the changes through the Services and sending you an email or message about the changes.
label: none

clause: We encourage you to check back regularly and review any updates.
label: none

clause: Additional Disclosures for United States Residents In certain US states, you may be entitled to additional rights or disclosures.
label: none

clause: Please see our United States Regional Privacy Policy, where you can learn more about how we use your information and any additional privacy rights you may have.
label: none

clause: Our Relationship With You Depending on where you live and what Services you use, different Etsy companies are responsible for your information.
label: none

clause: Details of the relevant Etsy company providing the Services are as follows: For the Services, including the Etsy Site and Apps (except Payments and Gift Cards): North or South America - Etsy, Inc.
label: none

clause: Outside of North and South America (including the EEA and UK) - Etsy Ireland UC For Payments Services and Gift Cards, depending on where you reside: North or South America - Etsy, Inc.
label: none

clause: and Etsy Gifting, LLC (for Gift Card purchases) Outside of North and South America (including the EEA and UK): Etsy Payments Ireland Limited - For disbursements to EEA Sellers Etsy Ireland UC - For disbursements to Sellers outside of North and South America and the EEA and Gift Card purchases.
label: none

clause: Contact Us If you have any questions: Contact Etsy’s Support team via our Help Center Chat Support (available on our Site) Send an email to Etsy's Data Protection Officer at dpo@etsy.com Write to us at one of the following addresses: In North America or South America: Etsy Support Team – Privacy Policy 117 Adams Street, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA Outside of North America and South America: Etsy Support Team – Privacy Policy One Le Pole Square, Ship Street Great, Dublin 8, Ireland.
